mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PS_Head_Teachers (NAME, grade, class, school_id, del_yn, insert_date, insert_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{grade}, #{sClass}, #{schoolId}, 'N', SYSDATE(), #{insertId});
mapper.select: SELECT HT.*,(Select name from PS_School SL where HT.school_id=SL.id AND del_yn='N') AS schoolName FROM PS_Head_Teachers HT WHERE HT.ID = #{id} AND HT.del_yn='N' ;
